translations: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的

sentences.sentence: He had made a humiliating tactical error and he had to go.
sentences.translation: 他犯下了一个令他耻辱的战术错误，被迫离职。

sentences.sentence: They have removed all tactical nuclear missiles that could strike Europe.
sentences.translation: 他们已经拆走了所有可能攻击欧洲的战术性核导弹。

sentences.sentence: I think he made a tactical blunder by announcing it so far ahead of time.
sentences.translation: 我认为他如此提早宣布消息是犯了战术上的错误。
